job.title: Senior Software Quality Engineer
job.description: An in-vitro diagnostic medical device organization, who are scaling at a rapid rate, are looking for a motivated Senior Software Quality Engineer to join their talented team on a remote basis.<br><br><strong><u>Senior Software Quality Engineer Responsibilities<br></u></strong><ul><li> Establish end-to-end automated tests using JavaScript, Selenium WebDriver, Appium, and other technologies.</li><li> Independently work through developing, executing, and reporting of V&amp;V plans and complex test protocols.</li><li> Work with team to create and execute an SDLC with automated traceability.</li><li> Create detailed, comprehensive test cases and plans.</li><li> Execute manual system integration tests.</li><li> Identify and thoroughly document bugs.</li><li> Assure that our product matches or exceeds our patients’ and clinicians’ expectations.<br></li></ul><strong><u>Senior Software Quality Engineer Skills And Qualifications<br></u></strong><ul><li> BS in computer science or related discipline, or equivalent work experience.</li><li> 6+ years experience in the software quality industry.</li><li> 3+ years experience in medical devices.</li><li> Expertise in test methodologies, writing test plans and cases, and debugging.</li><li> 2+ years exposure to automation testing frameworks and paradigms.</li><li> Prior experience developing or testing in compliance with recognized regulatory standards (21 CFR Part 820).</li><li> Demonstrable aptitude towards learning new technologies.</li></ul>
